title: The Legend of Tarzan (TV series)
summary: The Legend of Tarzan is an American animated television series produced by Walt Disney Television Animation, based on Tarzan from the novels written by Edgar Rice Burroughs, the character's original creator who appears in one episode of the series. The series is also based on the film Tarzan by Walt Disney Pictures, and aired on UPN from September 3, 2001, to February 5, 2003.[1]
